body.name: Anti-Theft Ring Doorbell Door Mount - No Drill, Compatible for Blink Doorbell Camera Mount Doorbell Camera Holder for Apartment Door for Home, Apartments, Office, and Businesses (No Doorbell)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 9 hrs 53 mins
features: Enhanced Security: This ring video doorbell mount features an upgraded anti-theft design to fully protect your wireless video doorbell, preventing theft and safeguarding your property.

No-Drill Installation: Enjoy hassle-free setup with our no-drill installation process. Simply place your video doorbell into the mount bracket, secure it with sponge pads, attach the stainless steel mount holder, and adjust the fixed clip. No drilling is required, making it easy to install on your home, apartment, office, or rental door.

Wide Compatibility: The video doorbell door mount is compatible with a range of video doorbells, including Video Doorbells (1/2/3/4 generation, 2020-2021 Release, Pro-Pro2). Doorbell size maximum 2.3 inches wide x 5.63 inches tall x 1.26 inches depth. Note that the video doorbell itself is not included, and our design ensures there's no interference with the camera sensor.

Door Compatibility: Our camera mount holder is designed for inward-opening doors, with door thickness ranging from 0.87 to 1.93 inches and a door gap width of at least 0.06 inches. Please ensure your door meets these specifications for proper installation.

100% Support & Warranty: We stand by our product with confidence. We offer a warranty for our valued customers. If for any reason the Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Door Mount does not meet your expectations, don't hesitate to reach out to us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doorbell Door Mount
reviews.reviewText: My Ring Doorbell is held firmly in place by the durable clamp, which also provides a dependable platform. All of this is accomplished without sacrificing the structural integrity of my door. The Ring Doorbell can't be tampered with or stolen since the mount comes with a reliable locking mechanism that comes standard. When you live in a neighborhood where there are periodic thefts from porches, having this additional layer of protection is a wonderful benefit. Because of the mount's sturdy design, I am certain that it will be able to survive any efforts at tampering and will thereby provide an additional layer of safety for my house. Because the mount can be adjusted to a variety of angles, I am able to set the Ring Doorbell for maximum coverage, which ensures that every nook and cranny of my entry is monitored. The mount's streamlined and inconspicuous form allows it to blend in completely with my door, which improves the appearance of the space as a whole without calling unwanted attention to itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: But it can cause the door to get stuck or the wood on the frame to chip , but it works and is good for anti theft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Only the bracket is metal
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my ring doorbell since I'm not allowed to drill into the door at my building or mount on a wall so a door mount is the only way to go.Before selecting it I went up and down the page trying to find anywhere that they said what it was made of but couldn't find anything. The description said it was designed to "fully protect your wireless video doorbell, preventing theft and safeguarding your property"Unfortunately that is not the case. the actual housing is made of plastic. It's a decent thickness but the weak point is the 4 press in nuts that hold it to the back plate. This could EASILY be ripped off the door without the use of much force.I will be looking around for an all metal one as I do not want to risk losing my doorbell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality ring doorbell mount that works very well overall!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Overall satisfied with it. Great build quality and looks good being very functional too.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Superb build quality- Very functional product & great compatibility with my ring doorbell- Comes with all accessories included- Overall easy to install these- Very reasonably priced in the competitionCons:- None that I see for this price & the quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep it safe
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes just having a camera isn't enough people will still try and steal it. After loosing 2 doorbell cameras I decided a locking case is my best bet to keep my camera safe. This was easy to install with no drilling required. This will keep porch pirates away because they can't just snatch it and run away without getting caught. It can be adjusted perfectly to your door frame and it secures inside the house so to remove it they will have to break it or open your front door.
